title: The Evolution of the IDW with David Fuller
description:
I speak with @Rebel Wisdom David Fuller about the Intellectual Dark Web. We look at how it began, the directions it could've taken, and where it sits now. We also discuss a bit of David's background and his vision for Rebel Wisdom
Podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/The-Evolution-of-the-IDW-with-David-Fuller-eaavrq
David's channel Rebel Wisdom: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFQ6Gptuq-sLflbJ4YY3Umw
Follow David and Rebel Wisdom on twitter here: @fullydavid and @wisdomrebel 
Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
Ryan Bennett's IDW twitter thread: https://twitter.com/Ry_Nomad/status/1050999180276060160
My interview with Ryan about IDW Protocol: https://youtu.be/z3TCy8X_0bw
#theintellectualdarkweb #rebelwisodm
